name: WP Scroll To Top
author: Md sohel

sections.description:
Wp Scroll To Top plugin offers custom settings which no other plugin have.

This plugin will enable awesome slider in your wordpress theme. You can use the jeba cute slider via shortcode in everywhere you want, even in theme files.

We are offering primiam service. I can install this plugin in $5 pleac send order fiverr. I will responsive whithen in 20 minete

  • Pre-Designed Icons.
  • Fluid/responsive icon.
  • Compatible with all WordPress themes.
  • It is user friendly and very easy to install.
  • Zero coding skills required to set up this plugin.
  • Customizable options via the admin panel
  • You can change background color.
  • You can change icons color.
  • It is user friendly and very easy to install.
  • Zero coding skills required to set up this plugin.

sections.installation: • Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
